options.content:
# Notes
- IPFS server with content is in Ljubljana. Uploaded content is pinned
- concerning secondary downloads only bee-3.dev server has some extra caching. (65.108.101.3
65.108.104.135). The rest is just bee.
- IPFS gateway servers used are: "ipfs.io", "w3s.link", "ipfs.eth.aragon.network", "nftstorage.link", "cloudflare-ipfs.com"
- size is in kilobytes values in seconds
- source https://github.com/darkobas2/util_web3_storageperf

panels.description:
Time it takes from when data was uploaded to when it was first downloaded. ie. distribution time
y - number of concluded tests
x - time those tests were concluded in
panels.title: Distribution IPFS

y axis is time in seconds
x axis is grouped by tested data in kilobytes and storage

options.content:
# Notes
- There are some ?anomalies? (or is it ?) in ipfs fetch... so for the sake of prettier graphs we filter out any values above 1000s
- IPFS server with content is in Ljubljana. all Uploads are pinned
- IPFS downloads using ipget https://github.com/ipfs/ipget
- size is in kilobytes values in seconds
- source https://github.com/darkobas2/util_web3_storageperf

panels.description:
y - number of concluded tests
x - time those tests were concluded in
We are filtering out all values above 1000 seconds!!!
panels.title: Existing Downloads IPFS
